content.question: Based on the data in the table, which of the following best predicts the results of a study in which natural populations of T. atratus and T. sirtalis are observed together in an environment that includes a freshwater pond?

choices.label: Neither T. atratus nor T. sirtalis will be observed near the water.
T. atratus will be observed near the water whether or not T. sirtalis is present.
T. sirtalis will be observed near the water whether or not T. atratus is present.
T. atratus and T. sirtalis will be observed together near the water.

content.answer: T. sirtalis will be observed near the water whether or not T. atratus is present.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
